snippet: In Warren Ellis’s “Gun Machine” a murderous psychopath who believes he is a resident of pre-colonial Manhattan is tracked by a messy, isolated police detective.
abstract: Charles McGrath reviews book Gun Machine by Warren Ellis.
lead_paragraph: In Warren Ellis’s “Gun Machine” a murderous psychopath who believes he is a resident of pre-colonial Manhattan is tracked by a messy, isolated police detective.

headline.main: Big City, Crazy Killer, Loner Cop
headline.print_headline: Big City, Crazy Killer, Loner Cop
